extendedInfo.description: Prepare your theory test for car with latest and official DSA revision question bank which has over 970 questions. ***************************************************** "This application is extremely well designed and very well organised, It will prove a valuable resource to those taking their driving theory test" - iCreate Magazine. ***************************************************** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PREPARE BY TOPICS: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You can study the highway code by topic. All questions are sorted by topic. It also tells you the areas that each topic covers. â Accidents â Alertness â Attitude â Documents â Hazard Awareness â Motorway Rules â Other Types of Vehicle â Road and Traffic Signs â Rules of the Road â Safety Margins â Safety and Your Vehicle â Vehicle Handling â Vehicle Loading â Vulnerable Road Users ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ MOCK TEST MODE: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Mock test simulates the real test format. Questions are presented randomly from all the topics. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DETAILED TEST RESULTS: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ A summary of the practice test is presented at the end of each test. It shows you the time you took, the score, which questions you answered correctly and where you were wrong.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PROGRESS METER: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The app records your progress as you start giving practice tests. It shows you a beautifully animated bar chart so that you can track your weak areas and retry the questions you answered incorrectly. ~~~~~~~~~~~ FEATURE LIST: ~~~~~~~~~~~ â¢ Over 970 multiple-choice questions. â¢ Choose number of questions you would like in each test. â¢ A new module, "Progress Meter" keeps track of how you are performing in a particular topic, and retry the questions you answered incorrectly. â¢ Choose your own timer settings. â¢ Special algorithm that randomizes questions every time you take a test. â¢ Mock test has exactly similar format as in real test. Copyright Info: â¢ Crown copyright material reproduced under licence from the Driving Standards Agency and the controller of HMSO which does not accept any responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction. â¢ The questions are valid for theory tests taken after April 2013The Theory test for car drivers.Keywords :-  DSA, HGV, PCV, Passenger, Vehicle, accident, braking, car, Class, documents, driver, driving, highway, learning, license, question, road, rules, safety, sign, test, theory, traffic, uk

reviews.title: Passed my theory because of this app!!
reviews.comment: Sat the \'mock test\' in this app around 6/7 times and when I sat my real theory test I recognised the majority of the questions. Top top app, couldn\'t recommend highly enough!!
reviews.author: Calum Wylie

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Works reli well an great selection of topics
reviews.author: Rabia Mehmood

reviews.title: This app is the best thing for the job!
reviews.comment: After failing the theory twice by not revising i found this app it was excelent prepared for things to come in the test and helped me pass i will recomend this app ti every one its cheap well worth the money you\'ll be sill not to get this app!!!
reviews.author: Billy Thomas

reviews.title: Correction
reviews.comment: Restarted my phone and it installed. Bizarre. Looks like a brilliant App guys. Well priced, portable and hopefully gunna set me on my way to getting on the road.
reviews.author: Gary Moore

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: For first time taking the theory test is is well recommended . Passed first time
reviews.author: Jack Morris

reviews.title: Passed my theory
reviews.comment: I got 49/50 on my theory test with this app, so I would recommended it to those who are looking to sit theirs. Make sure you revise for your Hazard Perception as well, I didn\'t very much as I was too occupied revising on this and I was lucky enough to beat the pass mark by a few marks.
reviews.author: Ayaz Ullah

reviews.title: galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Thanks to the makers of this app... i had issues and they gabe me directions to fix it.. great app
reviews.author: Gordon Murinda

reviews.title: Wrong results in mock tests
reviews.comment: Say a question has 4 answers and I am to select 3 of them, I select a,b and c. Upon checking the results it will make out I answered a,b and d! Failing me the question. Fix please.
reviews.author: Oliver Ebbinghaus

reviews.title: I passed and so will you!! Best software on google play.
reviews.comment: Brilliant software, quick and updated regularly. I literally passed yesterday with 49 out of 50 correct. If only this came with 14 hazard clips to watch! Theres a certain time where you need to click (if u click too early u score nothing yet click late and u at least score something. So click once. Wait a beat then click again and ur bound to score). Anyways, brilliant software.best one on here and with practice u will pass. Handy to do on phone too any time u get free. Great stuff
reviews.author: Dave James-Turvey

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I studied this for 3 days and passed my driving and got most of the question same from here. Thanks for the app
reviews.author: inam kharel

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I have just passed my theory test with 46/50 and i only used this app no book no cd. This app is just awesomeeee!!!!
reviews.author: Danish Rehman

reviews.title: Keeps crashing on tablet and phone
reviews.comment: I am very disappointed that I had to buy another app as this one stops working many times on both tablet & phone. Otherwise, good contents ,when working
reviews.author: mohannad ibraheem

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app. I passed my test in 1st time. Just learned from this app. Thanks
reviews.author: kristine zurkova

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: I have started using this app a week ago. Now I passed the test I got the same question\'s
reviews.author: deena dayalan

reviews.title: 5 Star App.
reviews.comment: The best Theory App! I passed my test today with full marks. I love the format of this app. An appear worth 5 Stars...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: V good
reviews.comment: Verry good app helped me loads
reviews.author: Tony Berti

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This app helped me pass my theory test so happy I downloaded it. It\'s easy to use and very helpful.
reviews.author: Priyen S

reviews.title: I passed
reviews.comment: this app is brilliant, I seen all the questions from this in my theory that\'s well good :p
reviews.author: Daunte Walcott

reviews.title: Extracting
reviews.comment: Always fails when trying to extract..want a refund!
reviews.author: Andrew Hughes

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: This app is brilliant! Used it to study and practice for my test and I passed my theory test at the firt attempt !! Amazing!
reviews.author: Samantha Pratt
